item.title: My life, my universe, my everything
item.description: Last year involved moving jobs to Mango as Principal Consultant, moving home, getting a dog, and Oz becoming the Purple Tadpole. That was on top of SQL Relay, copious presentations, and much travelling. By the end of the year I was pretty ill and exceedingly grumpy. Oz wasn’t having a huge amount of fun either between me never being home and him having to hold the fort in a massive way.
